column4: hey guys, my ubuntu slows down and I am not 100% sure what is the cause - my fan is whirring non-stop right now for example... but I only have 3 tabs on FF on and xchat
I am doing a 'free -m' and it says total : 3037, used 2637!
my fan roars when I play any 3D games or when I'm viewing lots of youtube
